content.question: ​An angle <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is in standard position in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. Which of the following is true about <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> if <math alttext="tan theta equals 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: There is a value of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="tan theta equals 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in Quadrant I only.

There are values of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="tan theta equals 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in Quadrants I and III only.

​There are values of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="tan theta equals 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in all four Quadrants.

​​There is no value of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="tan theta equals 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: There are values of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="tan theta equals 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in Quadrants I and III only.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
